Script.name: MedBootstrap
Script.script:
MedBootstrap = MedBootstrap or {}
MedBotstrap.version = "1.0.0"
function MedBootstrap.eventHandler(event, ...) if event == "sysConnectionEvent" then
local packages = getPackages() if not table.contains(packages, "MDK") then installPackage("https://github.com/demonnic/MDK/releases/download/v2.10.0/MDK.mpackage") end
if not table.contains(packages, "EMCOChat") then installPackage("https://github.com/demonnic/EMCO/releases/latest/download/EMCOChat.mpackage") end
if not table.contains(packages, "MedUI") then installPackage("https://github.com/jmckisson/MedScripts/blob/master/MedUI/MedUI.mpackage") end
end end
MedBootstrap.registeredEvents = { registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysConnectionEvent", "MedBootstrap.eventHandler") }
